sentences.en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentences.cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentences.en: A tooth which has been hit hard may discolour.
sentences.cn: 受过重击的牙齿可能会变色。

sentences.en: Add more honey if you have a sweet tooth.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢吃甜的就多加点蜂蜜。

sentences.en: armed to the teeth; dressed to the teeth.
Deposits of plaque build up between the tooth and the gum.
sentences.cn: 牙齿和牙龈之间会滋生牙斑。

sentences.en: He fought tooth and nail to keep his job.
sentences.cn: 他竭尽全力保住自己的工作。

sentences.en: His tooth had started to throb painfully again.
I got an abscess so he took the tooth out.
sentences.cn: 我牙龈脓肿，所以他就把那颗牙拔掉了。

sentences.en: I lost a tooth while chomping on a French baguette!
sentences.cn: 我啃法棍面包时，崩掉了一颗牙！

sentences.en: I picked up a free booklet on tooth care at the dentist's.
sentences.cn: 我在牙医那里拿了一本关于牙齿保健的免费小册子.

sentences.en: I went to my dentist to have a tooth taken out.
sentences.cn: 我去找牙医拔了一颗牙.

sentences.en: I've just had a tooth out at the dentist's.
sentences.cn: 我刚在牙科诊所拔了一颗牙。

sentences.en: Sugar is bad for your teeth.
the course gives students something to get their teeth into.
sentences.cn: 这门课程能给学生一些值得深究的东西。

sentences.en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

sentences.en: The twins fight tooth and nail over the slightest disagreement.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎为了一点儿小矛盾而吵得不可开交.

sentences.en: Unions pledged to fight any compulsory redundancies "tooth and nail".
sentences.cn: 工会许诺会“竭尽所能地”阻止任何强制裁员。

sentences.en: When not removed, plaque causes tooth decay and gum disease.
sentences.cn: 牙斑如果不清除就会导致牙齿蛀蚀和牙龈疾病。

words.tran_cn: 有齿的；锯齿状的；凛冽的
装齿；使成锯齿状；咬合（tooth的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: get (one's) teeth into 或 sink (one's) teeth into &I{【俚语】}
phrases.tran_cn: 积极地参与其中；牢牢地抓住
积极而富成效地工作；专注于
岁口大的（马）；年迈的，年老的
示威：表现准备战斗；凶狠地进行威胁
全副地：不缺少任何东西的；全部地
牙仙子（是英国童话里的一个仙子）

trans.tran_en: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food
